text: Lauri Kaila is a Finnish entomologist and researcher of biodiversity, specializing in Lepidoptera, at the Finnish Museum of Natural History of the University of Helsinki. As of 2018, Kaila authored 171 species within the family of Elachistidae. ==Publications== See Wikispecies below. ==References== == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Taxon authorities Category:Finnish entomologists Category:Finnish biologists Category:Finnish zoologists Category:Finnish academics Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Lauri Kaila
